properties.displayName: Potential WMI Lateral Movement WmiPrvSE Spawned PowerShell
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((FolderPath endswith "\\powershell.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\pwsh.exe") or (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName in~ ("PowerShell.EXE", "pwsh.dll"))) and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\WmiPrvSE.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects Powershell as a child of the WmiPrvSE process. Which could be a sign of lateral movement via WMI.
